import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { FormGroup,FormControl } from '@angular/forms'; import { EmployeeService } from '../employee.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-employee-list', templateUrl: './employee-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./employee-list.component.css'] }) export class EmployeeListComponent implements OnInit{ genders = ["male","female"] employeeForm !:FormGroup; constructor(private emplyoyeeservice:EmployeeService){} ngOnInit(): void { this.getemployeeList() this.employeeForm= new FormGroup({ email: new FormControl('',), name: new FormControl(''), dob: new FormControl(''), department: new FormControl(''), gender: new FormControl(''), }); } addEmployee(){ console.log(this.employeeForm.value) } getemployeeList(){ this.emplyoyeeservice.getEmployeeList().subscribe(res=>{ console.log(res); }) } }
